反攻上陸作戦「トーチ作戦」\nに参加するため、遠征艦隊を\n西方に派遣する！同進: Send an expeditionary fleet westwards to take part in Operation Torch, a counter-offensive landing operation! Conduct frontline sweeping on the same route!
アラビア海/アデン湾/紅海: Arabian Sea / Gulf of Aden / Red Sea
海上輸送によって航空基地を\n前進し、艦隊主力を展開して\nアデン湾周辺の安全を: Advance air bases by sea transport, deploy main fleet forces and secure the area around the Gulf of Aden! Advance to the Suez Canal!
スエズ運河を抜けて、地中海\n方面へ進出！基地航空隊と連\n携し、アレクサンドリ: Advance through the Suez Canal and into the Mediterranean! In coordination with the base air force, advance from Alexandria and break through the Mediterranean!
トーチ作戦任務部隊、抜錨！: Operation Torch Task Force, Weigh Anchor!
北アフリカ方面への反攻上陸\n「トーチ作戦」を開始する！\n英国及び米東海岸方面: Launch Operation Torch, a counter-offensive landing in the North African sector! Launch the fleet from the UK and the US East Coast! Move into position now!
いよいよ北アフリカ沿岸へ着\n上陸作戦を開始する！兵力を\n陸揚げした後、敵地上: Finally, the landing operations on the North African coast are about to begin! After landing the troops, destroy the enemy ground forces! Watch out for enemy counterattacks!
大反攻上陸作戦「トーチ」の\n総仕上げ、要衝カサブランカ\n攻略作戦を実施する！: The grand counter-offensive landing "Operation Torch" is now in full swing, namely the assault on the key city of Casablanca! Neutralise the anchored fleet, including battleships!
対空、対潜警戒を厳にせよ！:
Maintain strict anti-aircraft and
anti-submarine precautions!
遠征艦隊の前路掃討を実施する！抜錨！:
Conduct frontline sweeping for
the expeditionary fleet! Weigh anchor!
遠征艦隊、アデン湾方面へ進出せよ！:
Expeditionary fleet, advance towards
the Gulf of Aden!
スエズ運河を越え、地中海に進出せよ！:
Cross the Suez Canal and
enter the Mediterranean!
敵機動部隊、接近中！警戒を厳にせよ！:
Enemy task force approaching!
Maintain high vigilance!
トーチ作戦派遣部隊、抜錨する！\n大西洋上、対潜警戒も厳に！:
Operation Torch Detachment, anchor away!
Maintain strict anti-submarine precautions in
     the Atlantic Ocean!
地中海連合艦隊、これより敵主力艦隊を捜索、\n発見次第、これを撃滅する！:
The Mediterranean Combined Fleet will now
search for the main enemy fleet and destroy
     it on sight!
カサブランカ方面の偵察を実施！\n同港に戦艦級含む有力な艦隊を認む！:
Conduct reconnaissance in the Casablanca
area! Identify the leading fleet that contains a
     battleship class in the same port!
「トーチ作戦」の総仕上げを敢行する！\n西方任務部隊、カサブランカへ！:
We are going to put the finishing touches to
Operation Torch! Western Task Force,
     to Casablanca!
「トーチ作戦」西方任務部隊、先遣部隊、\nこれよりカサブランカ方面に進出する！:
Operation Torch, Western Task Force,
Vanguard Force, now moving into the
     Casablanca area!
